resources.string: In the heart of Old Delhi, Chandni Chowk is a busy shopping area with markets full of spices, dried fruits, silver jewellery and vivid saris, while the narrow side streets are crowded with tiny shops selling essential oils, stationery and traditional Indian sweets.
Chandni chowk has 10 assembly constituencies spread across ...... sq km. Adarsh Nagar, Ballimaran, Matia mehal, Sadar Bazar, Model Town, Shalimar Bagh, Shakur Basti, Tri Nagar and Wazirpur
